column5: We are now accepting applications for the Management course for January 2022. Please visit our website for more information.Are you looking for a degree that allows you to develop skills in multiple areas of business management? You may be interested in marketing as well as international management or starting your own company. Or perhaps you want to develop a sound understanding of global supply chains as well as business analytics?
column7: Please visit our website for the Management course fee information.
column9: MSc: 1 year full-time; 2 years part-time; PGDip: 1 year full-time
